name: Color Guesser
description:
Program used to practice the skill of guessing RGB color values. 

Player is given a randomly generated color and must guess the amount of red, green and blue in the color by typing an RGB code. Each value ranges from 0 to 255, and the player receives a score from 0 to 100, where 100 is the best possible score. 
"Avg" representes the average score for the last 10 rounds.
